catalog_info.title: Design and Analysis of Sample Surveys
catalog_info.notes: The regular classroom hours of Stat 160 are 2:30 - 4:00. The extra hour is for extra discussion for 260.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Statistics 110, 111, and 139 or with permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: Meets with Statistics 160, but graduate students will have an extended class period and complete additional assignments for a more theoretical, in-depth treatment of topics.
